title: 75. Working Through Triggers and Criticism
description:
Hey sis!

In this episode from a previous Instagram live, we talk all about working through triggers and criticism and how triggers are NOT a sign that you are "not healing". You won't want to miss this.

Click here to join the waitlist for my upcoming Self-love course to get $150 off! Hurry! The waitlist closes on October 11, 2020!

Business Inquiries?
Email the team: hi@beatricekamau.com
IG: @theselflovefix.
Website: www.beatricekamau.com
